item.title: Welcome (back)!
item.description: I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve redone my website over the years not to mention the number of times I’ve switched between blogging and static website hosting platforms. Hopefully, this iteration can hang around for a while before I inevitably scrap it in favour of something else. Welcome back!

item.title: Reading List
item.description: 2021 The Last Wish - Andrej Sapkowski Going Postal - Terry Pratchett 2020 The Black Company - Glen Cook 2019 Rocket Men - Robert Kurson 2018 Bad Blood - John Carreyrou The Three Body Problem - Cixin Liu The Emperor of All Maladies - Siddhartha Mukherjee Small Gods - Terry Pratchett 2016 Being Mortal - Atul Gawande 2015 Hiroshima - John Hershey The Man Who Knew Infinity - Robert Kanigel The Martian - Andy Weir
